pages.text: vezuhrufa. vein kullu zalike lemma meta`u-lhayati-ddunya. vel'ahiratu `inde rabbike lilmuttekin
vemey ya`su `an zikri-rrahmani nukayyid lehu seytanen fehuve lehu karin
hatta iza caena kale ya leyte beyni vebeyneke bu`de-lmesrikayni febi'se-lkarin
veley yenfe`akumu-lyevme iz zalemtum ennekum fi-l`azabi musterikun
efeente tusmi`u-ssumme ev tehdi-l`umye vemen kane fi dalalim mubin
feimma nezhebenne bike feinna minhum muntekimun
festemsik billezi uhiye ileyk. inneke `ala siratim mustekim
veinnehu lezikrul leke velikavmik. vesevfe tus'elun
ves'el men erselna min kablike mir rusulina. ece`alna min duni-rrahmani alihetey yu`bedun
velekad erselna musa biayatina ila fir`avne vemeleihi fekale inni rasulu rabbi-l`alemin
felemma caehum biayatina iza hum minha yadhakun
